text: Egha Moses kamaghɨn Aron mɨgei, “Nɨ uan ofan mɨgharir mughuriar aghuim zuimɨn itarim inigh, ofan dakozimɨn avir mɨkɨar isia itiba ko pauran taba dar arɨkigh. Egh zuamɨra gumazamiziba bagh mangɨ, men arazir kuraba gɨn amangɨsɨ, ofa damu. Bar guizbangɨra, Ikiavɨra Itir Godɨn anɨngagharim izaghirɨzɨ, arɨmariar bar kuram otogha me gasɨghasɨzima, marazi ariaghiri.”
